name: Low Control
description:
Game made for GMTK game jam 2020, this is the first time I'm participating in a jam so I hope you like it.

You can move faster, jump higher and destroy little walls while pressing Ctrl to use your energy boost, but be careful and don't waste it, because you need it to get to the end of the level.

A-D - Move

W or Spacebar - Jump

Ctrl - Boost speed and jump

R - Restart current level
